subprocess_flow.description: Review existing data governance policies and security requirements to understand the guidelines for data access. This includes identifying data sensitivity levels, compliance mandates, and any specific access restrictions that need to be enforced. This review ensures that the access procedures align with organizational standards.
outputs: Summary of relevant data governance policies and security requirements
success_criteria: Comprehensive understanding of data governance policies and security requirements

subprocess_flow.description: Define specific access control roles based on job functions and data access needs. This involves identifying the different types of users who require access to data and the level of access they need (e.g., read-only, read-write, full control). Role definitions should be clear and unambiguous.
inputs: Summary of relevant data governance policies and security requirements
success_criteria: Clearly defined access control roles aligned with job functions

subprocess_flow.description: Implement RBAC to manage data access permissions. This involves assigning users to specific access control roles and granting those roles the appropriate permissions to access data assets. RBAC simplifies access management and ensures that users only have access to the data they need.
success_criteria: Functional RBAC system with appropriate access permissions

subprocess_flow.description: Configure authentication mechanisms to verify user identities before granting data access. This may involve implementing multi-factor authentication (MFA) to enhance security. Authentication mechanisms should be robust and reliable to prevent unauthorized access.

Establish data encryption procedures to protect sensitive data at rest and in transit. This involves implementing encryption algorithms and key management practices. Data encryption should be applied to all data assets that require protection.
success_criteria: Secure data encryption procedures for sensitive data

subprocess_flow.description: Document the data access procedures, including the steps required to request data access, the approval process, and the data access policies. This documentation should be readily available to all users and data stakeholders. Clear documentation ensures consistent and compliant data access practices.
success_criteria: Comprehensive and user-friendly data access procedures documentation

subprocess_flow.description: Test and validate the implemented access controls to ensure that they are functioning correctly. This involves simulating different user scenarios and verifying that access permissions are enforced as expected. Testing and validation ensure that data is only accessible to authorized users.
success_criteria: Successful validation of access controls and documented results
